title: Thalawathugoda - 05 Bed Room - Brand New Luxury House
details:
2 km From Thalawathugoda junction facing 30 ft Polwatta Road
Super markets, Banks, Hospitals, Restaurants, Jogging paths are within 2 km radius.
Land extent is 10.85 p and house is app. 3600 sq. ft
Architect designed Engineer built 02 Storied luxury House in residential area
05 Bedrooms and 04 Toilets with hot water
Up stair has 04 Bed rooms and 03 Bath rooms with balconies for each room
Spacious family area also in the up stair,
Ground floor has a large bed room with a bath room
Large Living and dining room facing 02 court yards,
All bath rooms with hot water and tempered glass cubicles
3 phase electricity with LED fitted light fittings,
Kitchen Counter tops and Fitted Pantry
High parapet walls with remote controlled Roller Gate and CCTV
Separate servant quarters with a bath room,
Landscaped Front and back Garden with Root balled Trees
Parking for 3 vehicles.
Rs. 35.0 mil,
